Clinical Considerations 
Maternal Adverse Reactions 
[TRADENAME] may increase hyperglycemia in pregnant 
women with diabetes.  Monitor maternal blood glucose 
levels regularly and adjust insulin dosages as needed [see 
Warnings and Precautions (5.x)].
